text.description: The passage of text from which user may select responses

highlightChoices.description: Indicates if the parts of text that are choosable, should be highligned when presented to student.

partialScoring.description: Indicates if partial scoring should be used

maxSelections.description: The maximum number of token selections a user can make when responding

mode.description: The selected mode for tokenizing the text

tokens.description: The selectable text tokens in the main text content

id.description: Identifier to identify the Pie Element in html markup, Must be unique within a pie item config.

FeedbackType.description:
The type of feedback to use:
   `default` = a standard feedback message
   `custom` = a customized feedback message

start.description: The start point in the main text for this token

end.description: The end point in the main text for this token

correct.description: Is selected does the token represent a correct response
